member.name: WinRT.PdfCreateRenderer
member.summary: Gets an instance of the interface for displaying a single page of a Portable Document Format (PDF) file.
member.param: An instance of a Microsoft DirectX Graphics Infrastructure (DXGI) object that is used for producing image data.
An instance of the high-performance interface for rendering PDF content on a DirectX surface.

returns.para: This function can return one of these values.

member.name: WinRT.PdfRenderParams
member.summary: Populates a structure. A PDF_RENDER_PARAMS structure represents a set of properties for outputting a single page of a Portable Document Format (PDF) file.
member.param: The rectangular portion of the original page, as defined by the D2D_RECT_F structure's upper-left and lower-right corner x- and y-coordinates. The default value is 0.f for all coordinates.
The specified width of the page. The default is 0.f.
The specified height of the page. The default is 0.f.

The specified background color of the page. The default is {1.f, 1.f, 1.f, 1.f}, which represents the values 1.0 for red, green, blue, and alpha channel, respectively. These values, taken together, represent white at full opacity.
False to use the system's high contrast display settings; otherwise true. The default is true.
member.returns: Represents a set of properties for outputting a single page of a Portable Document Format (PDF) file.
